titleStmt.title: To the Right Honourable the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, the humble remonstrance and petition of English Protestants, against English and Irish Papists
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Probably published in 1678, as it discusses at some length the murder of Sir Edmond Berry Godfrey which happened in 1678. Dated 1677 by Wing.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
